#summary Credits and other implementations

This little library has been inspired by these previous works:

 * *Exceptions in C*
 By Laurent Deniau
  http://ldeniau.home.cern.ch/ldeniau/html/exception/exception.html

 * *Implementing Exceptions in C Programming language*
 By Adomas Paltanavicius
  http://adomas.org/excc/

Some other different implementations of exception handling systems in C are:

 * *Exceptions in C*
 By Andrew Snowden
  http://www-users.math.umd.edu/~asnowden/c-except.html

 * *Handling exceptions in C code*
 SWIG (Simplified Wrapper and Interface Generator)
  http://www.swig.org/Doc1.1/HTML/Exceptions.html#n2
